ComicInfo.Summary: Now Somewhere in the Black Holes of Sirius Major There Lived a Young Boy Name of... Rocket Raccoon!: The Hulk finds himself on Rocket Raccoon's world, where he helps Rocket and his friends against various menaces before he is sent home to Earth. Meanwhile, Betty pleads with Bereet to save the dying Rick Jones (who claims never to have met her before).
ComicInfo.Tags: Hulk-Hunters,Hulk,Rick Jones,Uncle Pyko,Halfworld,Psycho Circus,Blackjack O'Hare,Bereet,Hulk's Underground Cave,Rocket Raccoon,Betty Ross,Judson Jakes,Lylla,Wal Rus
